text: Tumhi sanga, apalya tya saksa denaryanna ana, jyanni hi saksa dyavi ki allahane yala harame kele ahe, maga jara te saksa detila tara tumhi tyancyasobata saksa de'u naka ani tyancya manamani iccha-akanksance anusarana karu naka ani jyanni amacya ayatinna khote tharavile ani je akhiratavara imana rakhata nahi ani (itaranna)apalya palanakartyasamana manatata
